price: E se, em verdade, te instiga alguma instigação de Satã, procura refúgio em Allah. Por certo, Ele é Oniouvinte, Onisciente.
arabic: وَإِمَّا يَنزَغَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ نَزۡغٞ فَٱسۡتَعِذۡ بِٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّهُۥ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-immā yanzaghannaka mina al-shayṭāni nazghun fa-is'taʿidh bil-lahi innahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
translations: an evil suggestion comes to you
